skills.name: Vine Lash
skills.description: Swamp Thing lashes out with his vines, dealing Spiritual DMG to an enemy and reducing their current Energy.
After the start of the battle, Swamp Think gains stackable Spiritual AMP.
skills.name: Natural Remedy

skills.description: Swamp Thing leaps into the air, dealing Spiritual DMG to enemies in a circular area and reducing their current Energy.
skills.name: Overgrowth
Swamp Surge
skills.description: At the start of battle, Swamp Thing summons [Swamp]. Its effect doubles if at least 3 [Justice League Dark] allies are present.
Increases all Champions' Spiritual DEF and additionally for [Warrior] Champions.
skills.name: Green Whisper
Small Target
skills.description: Atom shrinks rapidly, increasing his Dodge.

skills.name: Exponential Force
skills.description: Atom's ATK increases with each basic attack until the end of battle.

skills.name: Shockwave & Awe
skills.description: The Atom paridly expands in size and compresses atoms, dealing Physical DMG to all enemies and [stunning] them before existing the battle.

skills.name: Subatomic Retreat
skills.description: Upon defeat, the Atom deals Physical DMG to nearby enemies and [stunning] them before existing the battle.

skills.name: Small Target
skills.description: Increases all Champions' DEF.

skills.name: Murder Mittens
skills.description: Catwoman launches a flurry of attacks, dealing Physical DMG to an enemy.

skills.name: Cat Burglar
skills.description: Catwoman stealthily maneuvers behind an enemy to deal Physical DMG and stealing a percentage of the target's ATK.

skills.name: Cat Leash
skills.description: Catwoman attacks with her whip, dealing Physical DMG and stealing a percentage of the target's ATK. The ATKL stolen is stackable up to a maximum of 3 times.
Catwoman's Dodge increases every second.
skills.name: Feline Grace

skills.description: Increases all Champions' ATK.
skills.name: Predator's Instinct
Make it Rain
skills.description: Gatling Gal unleashes a hail of bullets, dealing Physical DMG to enemies within range.

skills.name: Dark Knight Detective
skills.description: Batman dodges a basic attack and throws a Batarang at the attacker, dealing Physical DMG and interrupting the target, after which Batman becoms briefly untargetable and gains a Physical DEF bonus.

skills.name: Utility Belt
skills.description: Batman throws a smoke bomb, dealing Physical DMG to enemies within a circular area, with a chance to reduce their ATK.

skills.name: Batmobile
skills.description: Using his advanced bat gear, Batman deals Physical DMG to enemies within range. If there are 3/5 [Justice League] allies present at the start of battle, damage is increased.

skills.name: I Am Vengeance
skills.description: At the start of battle, each [Justice League] ally present grants Batman 1 stack of ATK UP.

skills.name: Bob & Weave
skills.description: Increases [Warrior] Champions' Dodge.

skills.name: Light 'Em Up
skills.description: Good Day AK takes aim and unleashes a barrage, dealing Physical DMG to an enemy.

skills.name: Emerald Armory
skills.description: Hal Jordan materializes a giant hammer with Green Lantern energy, dealing Spiritual DMG to an enemy and [Stunning] them.

skills.name: Lantern Shield
skills.description: Hal Jordan creates an energy field that heals allies within range over time.

skills.name: Green Lantern's Light
skills.description: Heals allies within a circular area. Up to 50% of excess healing is converted into a [Shield].

skills.name: Green Lantern Corps
skills.description: Increases Healing Taken Up by all [Green Lantern Corps] Champions over time.

skills.name: Green Guardian
skills.description: Increases all Champions' Crit DMG RES.

skills.name: Hurricane Force
skills.description: Hawkgirl creates a powerful gust with her wings, dealing Physical DMG to nearby enemies and pulling enemies within range closer.

skills.name: Nth Degree
skills.description: Hawkgirl charges her weapon and strikes, dealing Physical DMG to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Dive Bomb
skills.description: Hawkgirl slams down from mid-air, dealing Physical DMG to nearby enemies. While casting this skill, she gains Super Armor and recovers HP bases on DMG dealt.

skills.name: Energy Absorption
skills.description: At the start of battle, Hawkgirl gains a shield based on her HP for each [Birds of Prey] ally present, up to a maximum amount.

skills.name: Thanagarian's Might
skills.description: Increases all Champions' HP.

skills.name: Starbolts
skills.description: Starfire unleashes a beam of light, dealing Spiritual DMG to enemies within range and reducing their ATK.

skills.name: Healing Energy
skills.description: While the [Energy Absorption Field] is active, allies inside it restore HP over time.

skills.name: Energy Absorption Field
skills.description: Starfire converts ultraviolet light energy into an Energy Absorption Field, reducing damage taken by allies inside, with [Outsiders] allies receiving extra DMG Reduction. If Starfire casts her Ultimate again while the Energy Absorption Field is active, it enhances the Field, stacking up to 3 times.
Starfire's Spiritual DEF is increased. At the start of battle, Starfire gains Energy for every [Outsiders] ally present.
skills.name: Precognition

skills.description: Increases all Champions' MEN and [Supporter] Champions' ATK.
skills.name: Empathic Perception
Amazonian Shield
skills.description: Wonder Woman infuses her shield with divine power, granting [Divine Shield] to the ally with the lowest HP percentage.

skills.name: Lasso of Truth
skills.description: Wonder Woman throws her Lasso of Truth, dealing Physical DMG to an enemy and inflicting [Stunned] on them.

skills.name: Bracelets of Submission
skills.description: Wonder Woman leaps high and clashes her Bracelets of Submission together to generate a showckwave, dealing Physical DMG to enemies within a fan-shaped area and [Stunning] them.

skills.name: Amazon Goddess
skills.description: When HP is below 75%, Wonder Woman's DEF increases.

skills.name: Athena's Aegis
skills.description: Increases all Champions' DEF.

skills.name: Throw Your Voice
skills.description: Quickly throws a [Canary Cry Bomb], dealing Physical DMG to enemies within a circular are and reducing their ACC.

skills.name: Inner Ear Disruption
skills.description: At the start of battle, Black Canary disrupts all enemies with a sonic wave, reducing their ATK.

skills.name: Canary Cry
skills.description: Black Canary deals Physical DMG to enemies within a circular area and inflicts [Silence] on them.

skills.name: Birds of a Feather
skills.description: At the start of battle, Black Canary's Physical DEF increases.

skills.name: Birdsong
skills.description: Increases [Birds of Prey] Champions' Crit RES.

skills.name: Artic Breath
skills.description: Supergirl draws in freezing air and exhales an icy blast, dealing Physical DMG to enemies in a fan-shaped area.

skills.name: Solar Recharge
skills.description: Increases DEF and MEN. At the start of battle, for each [Superman Family] ally present, Supergirl gains an additional stack of DEF and MEN Up, stacking up to 5 time(s).

skills.name: Solar Battery
skills.description: Supergirl channels her power, dealing Physical DMG to enemies in a circular area. At [Krypton Energy] Lv. 1, she absobs solar energy increasing this skill's Crit Rate. At [Krypton Energy] Lv. 3, solar energy enhances her might even more, increasing this skill's DMG.

skills.name: Family Ties
skills.description: Increases ATK. At the start of battle, for each [Superman Family] ally present, Supergirls' Unltimate DMG is increased, stacking up to 5 time(s).

skills.name: Power of Rao
skills.description: Increases all Champions' DEF and [Warrior] Champions' MEN.

skills.name: Poison Embrace
skills.description: Poison Ivy summons a Thorny Ivy next to an enemy. It inherits a percentage of Poison Ivy's Max HP and 100% of her other attributes. Every 1s, the Thorny Ivy deals Physical DMG to enemies around it, with a chance to inflict 1 stack of [Ivy Thorn].

skills.name: Bloom of Life
skills.description: Poison IOvy summons a Blooming Ivy next to her ally. It inherits a percentage of Poison Ivy's Max HP and 100% of her other attributes. Every 2s, the Blooming Ivy heals allies around it and inflicts 1 stacks of [Ivy Bloom].

skills.name: Growing Pains
skills.description: Poison Ivy unleashes green energy and summons countless vines, healing the target for a percentage of her ATK. Each vine she summons increases the healing effect up to a maximum of 300%.

skills.name: Death's Embrace
skills.description: Poison Ivy unleashes [Bewitching Spores], dealing Physical DMG to an enemy and inflicting [Bewitch], causing the target to slowly move towards her.

skills.name: Personal Growth
skills.description: Increases [Supporter] Champions' healing effect.

skills.name: Look Sharp
skills.description: Chop Chop leaps towards an enemy, dealing Physical DMG.

skills.name: Good Boy!
skills.description: Krypto heals allies within range.

skills.name: Therapy Dog
skills.description: When an ally drops below a target percentage HP, Krypto flies to their side, granting a shield and healing them. Can be cast manually with a cooldown.

skills.name: Zoomies
skills.description: Krypto zips around excitedly, knocking down enemies in his path and reducing their ATK. He also heals allies in his path. Krypto also passively increases his Energy and increases his healing effect.

skills.name: Best Super-Friend
skills.description: At the start of battle, Krypto gains bonus HP and increases all allies' DEF and MEN. Casting his Ultimate generates [Krypton Energy], and if Krypto is defeated, this effect transfers to the nearest [Superman Family] ally.

skills.name: Cuddle Charge
skills.description: Increases [Superman Family] Champions' ATK and DEF.

skills.name: Grenade Toss
skills.description: Throws a grenade, dealing DMG to enemies in a circular area.

skills.name: Spin Cycle
skills.description: Red Robin spins his staff in a defensive maneuver, gaining a shield and dealing Physical DMG to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Precision Bat
skills.description: Red Robin casts an electromagnetic Batarang, dealing Physical DMG to enemies within range and reducing their Crit RES.

skills.name: Bat-Tech Decoy
skills.description: Red Robin utilizes Wayne Tech to teleport above the target area and slams down with his staff, dealing Physical DMG to enemies within range. He then leaps back to his original position, turning invisible and leaving behind a [Holographic Decoy].

skills.name: Robin's Egg
skills.description: At the start of battle, Red Robin gains Energy. During combat, he gains a percentag of DMG reduction for every 1% of his Crit Rate, up to a maximum amount.

skills.name: Seeing Red
skills.description: Increases [Teen Titans] Champions' DEF.

skills.name: Eye on You
skills.description: Deathstroke advances behind an enemy and slashes with his swords, dealing Physical DMG. In auto mode, the skill targets the enemy with the highest ATK.

skills.name: Stroke of Genius
skills.description: At the start of battle, Deathstroke gains an ATK Up for eacvh [Legion of Doom] ally present.

skills.name: Slade's Blade
skills.description: Deathstroke uses multiple weapons in combat, dealing Physical DMG to an enemy.

skills.name: ACTH Serum
skills.description: Deathstroke's regenerative capabilities allow him to recover a percentage of his lost HP over time.

skills.name: Perfect Soldier
skills.description: Increases all Champions' HP and [Assassin] Champions' Dodge.

skills.name: Exorcism Blast
skills.description: Constantine unleashes a blast of flame, dealing Spiritual DMG to enemies in a circular area.

skills.name: Power Curse
skills.description: After Constantine casts [Summoned Flame] or [Exorcism Blast], there is a chance to inflict [Burn] on the target.

skills.name: Summonded Flame
skills.description: Constantine conjurs a firestorm that deals Spiritual DMG to enemies within a circular area. If [Black Magix Surge] is active, the next two ultimate casts deal increased Spiritual DMG.

skills.name: Black Magic Surge
skills.description: After Constantine casts his Ultimate, the area and range of his next [Exorcism Blast] and the DMG of his next [Summoned Flame] increase, stacking up to 2 times. At the start of battle, each [Justice League Dark] ally increases Constantine's ATK.

skills.name: Unfair Advantage
skills.description: Increases all Champions' ATK and [Magical] Champions' HP.

skills.name: Bondage of Fear
skills.description: Sinestro summons the Chain of Fear, dealing Spiritual DMG to an enemy.

skills.name: Strong Will
skills.description: Sinestro absorbs fear, restoring his Energy.

skills.name: Mind Over Matter
skills.description: Sinestro channels fear to deal Spiritual DMG to an enemy. The damage then chains to the next nearest enemy, with each chain attack dealing 40% of the previous attack's damage, affecting up to 3 targets.

skills.name: Fear Grows
skills.description: Whenever Sinestro or an ally defeats an enemy (excluding summons), for every [Legion of Doom] ally present, Sinestro's ATK increases.

skills.name: Sinestro's Might
skills.description: Increases all Champions' MEN and [Magical] Champions' Spiritual AMP.

skills.name: Trident's Shield
skills.description: Aquaman inflicts [Water Prison] on an enemy.
Aquaman summoonos waves to knock back enemies within a rectangular area in front of him, dealing Physical DMG.
skills.name: Breath of Atlantis

skills.description: Aquaman summons a waterspout, dealing Physical DMG over time to enemies within a circualr area while pulling them towards the center.
skills.name: Atlantean Vortex
Sea King
skills.description: At the start of battle, if there are at least 4 other [Justice League allies besides Aquaman, Aquaman's bassic attack have a 50% chance to deliver a heavy blow, dealing Physical DMG.
Increases [Justice League] Champions' Cris Rate.
skills.name: Neptune's Glory
Flock Together
skills.description: Raven summons a multitude of magical ravens through the Rift, dealing Spiritual DMG to enemies within a rectangular area in fronf of her. Raven restores HP equal to 50% of the DMG deealt.

skills.name: Demon's Shield
skills.description: Raven bends rtime and space, swapping places with a selected ally whose HP is below 50% and healing them for a percentage of Raven's ATK over time.

skills.name: Demon's Flight
skills.description: Raven transforms into a raven, circling overhead and healing all allies within a circular area in front of her for a percentag of her ATK.

skills.name: Dark Soul
skills.description: At the start of battle, Raven's ATK is increased.

skills.name: Daughter of Darkness
skills.description: Increases all Champions' ATK.

skills.name: Healing Waters
skills.description: Mera heals an ally.

skills.name: Water of Life
skills.description: Mera's healing amount is increased for the beginning of the battle.

skills.name: The Gift of Sea
skills.description: Mera summons a vortex, healing all allies within range over time.

skills.name: Crown of Atlantis
skills.description: Mera's ATK increases.

skills.name: Healing Waters
skills.description: Increases all Champions' HP.

skills.name: Vengeance is Mine
skills.description: Robin wields his two blades in a flurry of strikes, dealing Physical DMG to an enemy. When any attack deals Crit DMG, Robin unleashes a shockwave around him, dealing Physical DMG to each enemy within range, up to a maximum amount.

skills.name: Cloud of Bats
skills.description: Robin shoots several Batarangs in a fan-shaped area in front of him, dealing Physical DMG to enemies within range.

skills.name: Round Robin
skills.description: Robin darts across the battlefield, dealing slashes to enemies. Each slash deals Physical DMG. The first slash targets a selected enemy (the furthest raget in auto mode), with subsequent slashes hitting random enemies within range. Robin cannot be targeted during the attack.

skills.name: Brooding Legacy
skills.description: Robin's Crit Rate increases. When his Crit Rate is higher than 100% in combat, he gets Crit DMG equal to 1.5% times the excess, up to a maximum amount.

skills.name: League Synergy
skills.description: Increases [Assassin] Champions' ATK.

skills.name: Blow the Hood
skills.description: When Red Hood's basic attack deals Crit DMG, he throws a grenade upwards, dealing Physical DMG to enemies within range.

skills.name: Wrong Place, Right Time
skills.description: For every enemy within range, Red Hood's Crit Rate increases, up to a maximum of 30%.

skills.name: Strafe Strife
skills.description: Red Hood leaps to the target area and strafes, dealing Physical DMG to enemies within range.

skills.name: Bat-Family Tree
skills.description: After casting [Strafe Strife], Red Hood's Dodge increases.

skills.name: Ruthless Pursuit
skills.description: Increases all Champions' ATK.

skills.name: On Target
skills.description: Arsenal charges briefly before firing a sinal arrow, dealing Physical DMG to an enemy and inflicting stacks of [Deadly Mark].

Arsenal deploys an untargetable turret at his location. When an enemy deals damage with their Ultimate or special skill the turrent counterattacks by firing an explosive arrow at the attacker, dealing Physical DMG.
skills.name: Retribution
Rain of Destruction
skills.description: Arsenal shoots 9 arrows into the sky, deach dealing Physical DMG to a random enemy and influcting stacks of [Deadly Mark].

skills.name: Acrobat Attack
skills.description: At the start of battle, each [Outsiders] ally present increases Arsenal's Energy gain.
Increases [Outsiders] Champions' ATK.
skills.name: Weapon Maximization

skills.description: Martian Manhunter fires heat beams from his eyes, dealing Spiritual DMG to enemies within a rectangular area in front of him.
skills.name: H'ronmeer's Rage

skills.description: At the start of battle, J'onn's Physical DEF and MEN is increased.
skills.name: Outsidders Forever
Psionic Protection
skills.description: Martian Manhunter links minds with all allies granting them [Mind Ward]. When J'onn carries [Mind Ward], taking basic attack DMG reduces cooldown of [H'ronmeer's Rage].
Increases ATK. At the start of battle, if there are at least 3 [Outsiders] allies present, duration of [Mind Ward] is increased.
skills.name: Telepathic Bulwark
Telekinetic Shield
skills.description: Increases all Champions' DEF and [Warrior] Champions' DEF.

skills.name: Assassin's Strike
skills.description: Ra's al Ghul sacrifices HP to dash behind his target and strike.

skills.name: To the Death
skills.description: Ra's al Ghul gains bonus ATK based on his HP lost.

skills.name: Wrath of the Demon
skills.description: Ra's al Ghul's Ultimate and basic attacks host HP. The more HP sacrificed, the greater the DMG.

skills.name: Lazarus's Rise
skills.description: When taking lethal damage, Ra's al Ghul enters the Lazarus Pit to recover. If all allies are defeated, he returns and casts his ultimate.

skills.name: Lazarus Effect
skills.description: Increases all Champion's HP and [Assassin] Champions' HP additionally.

skills.name: Frozen Stiff
skills.description: Captain Cold blasts a freezing ray at the ground, dealing consecutive attacks to enemies within a circular area in front of him. Each attack deals Physical DMG and has a fixed 10% chance to render the target [Frozen].

skills.name: Cool Off
skills.description: At the start of battle, all [Legion of Doom] allies' Physical DEF and Spiritual DEF increases.

skills.name: On Ice
skills.description: Captain Cold creates an icy perch to snipe from, dealing Physical DMG to an enemy and inflicting [Frostbite].

skills.name: Avalanche
skills.description: When receiving melee attacks, Captain Cold immediately rolls backwards and then charges forward to knock down the target, dealing Physical DMG.

skills.name: Cold Analysis
skills.description: Increases all Champions' MEN.

skills.name: Familiar
skills.description: Vixen summons a deer spirit from her necklace that leaps to an ally, increasing their ATK.

skills.name: Raptor Attack
skills.description: Vixen summons a falcon from her necklace that swoops down on the target, dealing Physical DMG.

skills.name: King of Beasts
skills.description: Vixen summons a lion from her necklace that lets out a mighty roar, increasing ATK of allies within range.

skills.name: Fly High
skills.description: At the start of battle, Vixen's Dodge increases.

skills.name: Rhino Hide
skills.description: Increases all Champion's HP.

skills.name: Mystic Shield
skills.description: Doctor Fate casts a spell that grands a [Shield] to a selected ally.

skills.name: Ancient Strike
skills.description: Doctor Fate gathers Energy, dealing Spiritual DMG over time to an enemy.

skills.name: Protection Charm
skills.description: Doctor Fate casts a spell that grants a [Shield] to allies within a circular area.

skills.name: Dark Magic
skills.description: At the start of battle, every [Justice League Dark] ally increases the [Shield] strength granted by Doctor Fate.

skills.name: Fate Smiles
skills.description: Increases [Justice League Dark] Champions' HP.

skills.name: Maximum Damage
skills.description: Deadshot coontinuously fires at an enemy, dealing Physical DMG and reducing the target's healing received.

skills.name: Nowhere to Run
skills.description: Deadshot's basic attacks deal more damage to enemies affected by his healing reduction debuff.

skills.name: Marked for Death
skills.description: Deadshot fires a powerful bullet at an enemy, dealing Physical DMG and reducing the target's healing received, during which Deadshot gains Energy if the target is defeated.

skills.name: Killer Elite
skills.description: At the start of battle, Deadhshot's ACC increases.

skills.name: Dead Aim
skills.description: Increases [Firewpower] Champions' ATK.

skills.name: Crocodile Wrestling
skills.description: Killer Croc unleashes a devastating smash in front of him, dealing Physical DMG to enemies within range.

skills.name: Tough Hide
skills.description: Killer Croc's Physical DEF is increased.

skills.name: Ambush Predator
skills.description: Killer Croc lunges forward and crashes down, dealing Physical DMG to enemies within a circular area and inflicting [Shockwave].

skills.name: Sewer Strike
skills.description: When Killer Croc's HP drops below a target percentage, he retreats into the sewers, restoring HP, then surges towards the enemy with the highest ATK to deliver a crushing blow that deals Physical DMG. Can only be triggered once per battle.

skills.name: Thick Skin
skills.description: Increases all Champions' HP.

skills.name: Sonic Cannon
skills.description: Cyborg charges up to fire his sonic cannon, dealing Physical DMG to enemies within a rectangular area in front of him.
When Cyborg takes lethal damage for the first time and there is at least one living ally present, he blacks the damage and gains [Emergency Repair].
skills.name: Reboot
Scan Strike
skills.description: Cyborg scans the area in front of him, inflicting [Vulnerability] on enemies within a circular area.
When Cyborg is deployed in certain time-limited missions, he can extend the mission's time limit.
skills.name: System Hack
Hammer Blow
skills.description: Increases [Intimidator] Champions' Effect ACC.

skills.name: Incoming!
skills.description: Bazooka Bro fires a rocket, dealing Physical DMG to enemies within range.

skills.name: Luck of Tyche
skills.description: Queen Hippolyta grants a shield to the ally with the lowest HP percentage for 10s.

skills.name: Hera's Protection
skills.description: At the start of the battle, all allies' Physical DEF is increased for a period of time.
Queen Hippolyta stands firm and raises her sceptre, radiating divine power. Absorbs DMG taken by allies within 14 meters, during which she gains [Super Armor] and cannot recover Energy.
skills.name: Athena's Shield

skills.description: At the start of battle, Queen Hippolyta gains Energy. After casting Ultimate, Queen Hippolyta takes less DMG.
skills.name: Gaea's Gift

skills.description: Increases all Champions' HP and [Guardian] Champion's Physical DEF.
skills.name: Queen's Patronage
Terror Strike
skills.description: Scarecrow swings his scythe, dealing Spiritual DMG to enemies in front of him and inflicting 1 stack of [Scare], with a 50% base chance to reduce their MEN.

skills.name: Haunting Visions
skills.description: Scarecrow intimidates the enemy, dealing Spiritual DMG to enemies in a fan-shaped area in front of him and inflicting 1 stack of [Scare], with a chance to reduce their ATK.

skills.name: The Scent of Fear
skills.description: Scarecrow transforms into a towering phantom and releases a thick cloud of fear gas, dealing Spiritual DMG to enemies in a circular area and inflicting 2 stacks of [Scare]. If a target has 4 stacks of [Scare], [Memtal Breakdown] is also inflicted, incapacitating and slightly shrinking them and reducing rtheir MEN.

skills.name: Growing Terror
skills.description: Every time Scarecrow casts his Ultimate, he grows in size and gains DMG reduction, stacking up to 3 times. At the start of battle, all [Arkham's Most Wanted] allies gain 1 stack of MEN Up.

skills.name: Frightener
skills.description: Increases all Chasmpions' MEN and [Guardian] Champions' HP.

skills.name: Shoot You Twice
skills.description: Two-Face fires with one assault rifle, dealing Physical DMG to enemies within a circular area in front of him.

skills.name: Bleed You Dry
skills.description: When attacking an enemy inflicted with [Panic], Two-Face has a 50% chance to inflict 1 stack of [Bleeding] on the target.

skills.name: Both Bad Siides
skills.description: Two-Face fires with dual assault rifles, dealing Physical DMG to enemies withing a fan-shaped area in front of him and inflictiung 1 stack of [Panic].

skills.name: Shot in the Dark
skills.description: Two-Face's basic attack has a fixed 50% chance to attack with an assault rifle, dealing Physical DMG.

skills.name: Lawyer's Advice
skills.description: Increases [Arkham's Most Wanted] Champions' ATK.

skills.name: Elbuod Elbuort
skills.description: Zatanna creates a clone that inherits a percentage of her ATK and max HP. The clone attacks enemies with basic attacks. While the magical stage is active, the clone's attacks also deal Spiritual DMG to enemies in a circular area.

skills.name: Delgnis Tuo
skills.description: Zatanna selects an ally (including herself) with the highest ATK and increases their ATK.

skills.name: Eht Wohs Tsum Og No
skills.description: Zatanna creates a magical stage that grants all allies ATK Up and Physical DEF Up, during which Zatanna's basic attacks deal Spiritual DMG to enemies in a circular area.

skills.name: Epon
skills.description: At the start of battle, all [Justice League Dark] allies gain a percentage of Spiritual AMP every 4s, stacking up with a maximum of 35%.

skills.name: Ygrene Niag
skills.description: Increases all Champions' DEF and [Supporter] Champions Energy gain bonus.

skills.name: Ability Analysis
skills.description: Lex Luthor locks onto enemies ahead, unleashing a barrage that deals Physical DMG to enemies within a fan-shaped area.

skills.name: Natural Leader
skills.description: At the start of battle, Luthor's Energy Restoration Speed increases. For each [Legion of Doom] ally present, his Energy Restoration Speed increases.

skills.name: Warsuit
skills.description: Luthor commands an orbital strike from his satellite, dealing Physical DMG to an entire row of enemies.

skills.name: Human Supremacy
skills.description: At the start of battle, Luthoor provides support with his technological prowess, granting Energy to all [Legion of Doom] allies.

skills.name: LexCorp Bonus
skills.description: Increases [Legion of Doom] Champions' HP.
Batgirl deploys a drone behind an ally to transfer energy, nicreasing their Crit Rate. High-ATK allies without existing buffs are prioritized.
skills.name: Tactical Drone

skills.description: Batgirl flings her Grapnel Launcher, dealing Physical DMG to an enemy, reducing their Crit RES, and pulling them towards her.
skills.name: Grapple With This
Bat Scanner
skills.description: Batgirl scans the entire battleground and summons a drone behind every ally to transfer Energy, increasing all allies' Crit Rate.

skills.name: Babs's Boost
skills.description: At the start of battle, all allies' Crit DMG AMP increases. Batgirl gains initial Energy for each [Bat Family] ally present.
Increases [Bat Family] Champions' ATK.
skills.name: Detective Mode
Grand Slam
skills.description: Home Fun swings his club horizontally, ddealing Physical DMG to enemies within range and knocking them back.

skills.name: Venom Boost
skills.description: Bane increases his bvenom dosage, recoovering his lost HP per second.
After casting his ultimate, Bane gains DMG reduction. When his HP is below 50%, his Physical DEF is increased.
skills.name: Unbreakable

skills.description: Bane infuses his body with venom and unleashes a barrage of attacks, dealing Physical DMG to an enemy and restoring HP.
skills.name: Break You
Mob Mentality
skills.description: At the start of battle, all [Arkham's Most Wanted] allies gain [Robustness], increasing the Physical DEF by 10% and rendering them immunee to enemy forced movement effects.
Increases all Champions' DEF.
skills.name: Unbroken
Star Shield
skills.description: Stargirl applies DMG Reduction to an ally.

skills.name: Astral Autofire
skills.description: Stargirl unleashes energy at an enemy, dealing Spiritual DMG and reducing their Effect ACC.

skills.name: Cosmic Cleanse
skills.description: Stargirl dispels stacks of debuffs or weakening effects for all allies and applies DMG Reduction to them.

skills.name: Stellar Stamina
skills.description: At the start of battle, all aliles gain an Effect RES bonus for 20s.

skills.name: Tamaranean Blessing
skills.description: Increases all Champions' Effect RES.

skills.name: Manic Episode
skills.description: Harley Quinn feroviously attacks with a hammer, dealing Physical DMG to an enemy.

skills.name: Escalation
skills.description: Harley Quinn gains HP based on her DMG dealt. At the start of battle, all [Suicide Squad] allies gain HP based on their DMG dealt.

skills.name: Self-Actualization: Release Self
skills.description: Harley Quinn unleashes her full potential and enters a [Self-Actualization] state, dealing Physical DMG to a target and nearby enemies.

skills.name: Special Physiology
skills.description: Harley Quinn gains Energy for each enemy she defeats.

skills.name: Reckless Abandon
skills.description: Increases [Suicide Squad] Champions' ATK.
Big Boy shouts excitedly, restoring HP over time and taunting enemies within range.
skills.name: Trolling
Chill
skills.description: Conner Kent exhales a blast of icy wind, dealing Physical DMG to enemies in a circular area and reducing their Physical DEF until the end of battle, stacking up to 4 time(s).

skills.name: "S" Shield
skills.description: Conner Kent strengthens his resolve, reducing DMG taken from ranged skills.

skills.name: Super Bro
skills.description: Conner Kent unleashes his telekentic power, increasing ATK for both himself and the ally with the highest ATK (Supergirl takes priority if present). This effect is capped at a maximum of 133% of the target's base ATK each time, stacks up to 3 time(s), and lasts until the end of battle. The ally also becomes immune to control effects 1 time. The ATJK bonus is doubled for [Superman Family] allies.

skills.name: In the Genes
skills.description: At the start of battle, Connor Kent's ATK increases for each level of [Krypton Energy].

skills.name: TK Field
skills.description: Increases all Champions' MEN and [Supporter] Champions' HP.

skills.name: Bell Ring
skills.description: Cross Bar swings his crowbar with mighty force, dealing Physical DMG to an enemy and [Stunning] them.

skills.name: Wrath
skills.description: Black Adam unleashes a series of lightning bolts, dealing Spiritual DMG to a target and nearby enemies.

skills.name: Judgement of Osiris
skills.description: Black Adam ddeals more damage to enemies with less that 75% HP.

skills.name: Power of Aten
skills.description: Black Adam channels his power to unleash a lightning storm, dealing Spiritual DMG to enemies within a rectangular area in front of him.

skills.name: Injustice Society
skills.description: At the start of battle, Black Adam's ATK increases for 20s.

skills.name: Wisdom of the Gods
skills.description: Increases all Champions' MEN.

skills.name: Boxing Glove Arrow
skills.description: After a brief charge-up, Green Arrow fires a special boxing glove arrow, dealing Physical DMG to an enemy.

skills.name: Multitasking
skills.description: Green Arrow unleashes a volley of arrows into the air, dealing Physical DMG to enemies within range.

skills.name: Sharp Rain
skills.description: Green Arrow leaps into the air and shoots a barrage of arrows, dealing Physical DMG to an enemy.

skills.name: Watch and Learn
skills.description: Green Arrow's Crit Rate increases.

skills.name: Hunter's Instinct
skills.description: Increases all Champions' ATK.
Bang Bang fires a warning shot to support her allies, restoring Energy to all allies within range except herself.
skills.name: YEE-HA!
What a Gas
skills.description: The Joker detonates a bomb, dealing Spiritual DMG to enemies within range, and a base chance 50% to inflict stacks of [Joker Venom].

skills.name: Big Laugh
skills.description: The Joker's Spiritual AMP increases. Each of his attacks has a 50% base chance to inflict 1 stack of [Joker Venom] on the target. Can be triggered once every 1s.

skills.name: Joker Vemon
skills.description: The Joker deals Spiritual DMG to an enemy, with a 50% base chance to inflict 10 stacks of [Joker Venom]. In auto mode, he prioritizes the enemy with the most stacks of [Joker Venom]. After casting this skill, if an enemy reaches 50 stacks of [Joker Venom], their debuffs and weakening effects spread to other enemies, up to 5 stacks per effect.

skills.name: Buzz Off
skills.description: At the start of battle, The Joker gains 1 stack of ATK Up for each [Arkham's Most Wanted] ally present.

skills.name: Laugh Attack
skills.description: Increases all Champion's ATK and [Intimidator] Champions' ATK additionally.
Superman shoots a heat laser, dealing Physical DMG to an enemy.
skills.name: Heat Vision
Freeze Breath
skills.description: Superman inhales deeply before exhaling a freezing breath, dealing Physical DMG to an enemy and [Freezing] them.
Superman soars into space, gaining 1 permanent stack of [Solar Energy] before dealing Physical DMG to an enemy.
skills.name: Under a Yellow Sun
Man of Steel
skills.description: Superman's DEF increases. At the start of battle, Superman gains 1 stack of ATK Up for each [Superman Family] ally present.
Increases all Champions' HP and [Warrior] Champions' ATK.
skills.name: Hope Restored
Shadow Strike
skills.description: Talia al Ghul vanishes in a cloud of smoke, then reappears behind her target to perform a spinning slash, dealing Physical DMG to enemies within range.

skills.name: Recharge
skills.description: Talia al Ghul sacrifices a portion of her Max HP to gain Energy.

skills.name: Unleashed Rage
skills.description: Talia al Ghul sacrifices some of her current HPto deal Physical DMG to nearby enemies. Targets with high remaining HP take increased DMG.

skills.name: Lazarun Boost
skills.description: Increases Talia al Ghul's Crit Rate. When an enemy [excluding summons] is defeated, she restores a portion of her Max HP for each [League of Assassins] ally present.

skills.name: Coordinated Ambush
skills.description: Increases all Champions' ATK and [Assassin] Champions' ATK additionally.
The Pengiun deals Spiritual DMG to enemies within a circular area in front of him, with a 50% chance to inflict 1 stack of [Engine Oil].
skills.name: Oil Spill

skills.description: The Penguin summons a Penguin Commando around him, which automatically seeks out targets and explodes on impact, dealing Spiritual DMG to nearby enemied.
skills.name: Bird of Prey

skills.description: The Penguin summons Penguin Commandos in front of him, which automatically seek out targets and explode upon impact, dealing Spiritual DMG to nmearby enemies.
skills.name: For the Birds

skills.description: When taking melee attacks, The Penguin immediately moves backward. Can be triggered once per skill level per battle. An additional Penguin Commando is summoned with each Ultimate cast.
skills.name: Umbrella Retreat
Keen Analysis
skills.description: Increases all Champions' MEN.
Gains [Courage of Achilles].
skills.name: Achilles Summon

skills.description: Shazam dashes forward and unleashes a burst of lightning within a circular area around him, dealing Physical DMG and gaining a Shield.
skills.name: Wisdom of Solomon
Strength of Hercules
skills.description: Shazam deals Physical DMG to enemies within a circular area around him and [Taunts] them.

When Shazam takes lethal damage, his HP is locked at 1 instead and he recovers a percentage of his Max HP over time, inflicting [Taunted] on all enemies at the cost of all his Energy. Can be triggered once per battle.
skills.name: Atlas Boost
Achilles' Shield
skills.description: Increases [Guardian] Champions' Crit RES.

skills.name: Crowd Control
skills.description: Sheild Squad slams his baton into the ground, dealing Physical DMG to enemies within range.

skills.name: What a Rush
skills.description: The Flash zips to the side of an ally to assist, increasing the target's ATK. In auto mode, the skill targets the ally with the highest ATK.

skills.name: Speed Strike
skills.description: The Flash attacks enemies while running in circles, dealing Physical DMG to enemies within a circular area.

skills.name: Speed Force Sharing
skills.description: The Flash channels his Energy to an ally until they are fully charged or his Energy is deploeted, and increaases the target's ATK. Casting the Ultiimate costs The Flash a percentage of Energy. In auto mode, the skill targets the ally with this highest ATK.

skills.name: Fast Friends
skills.description: The Flash runs to an ally's back and grants them [Speed Force Resonance]. In auto mode, the skill targets the ally with the lowest HP percentage.

skills.name: Speed Healing
skills.description: Increases all Champions' HP.

skills.name: Shadow Flip
skills.description: Nightwing flips over the enemy with the lowest HP, dealing Physical DMG. He is untargetable during the leap.

skills.name: Bright Knight
skills.description: Upon each attack, Nightwing gains 1 stack of Crit RTate Up. Stackable up to a maximum of 5 times.

skills.name: Darkest Knight Strike
skills.description: Nightwing strikes an enemy in front of him, dealing Physical DMG. Nightwing gains 1 stack of Crit DMG APM Up and Cris Rate Up for each [Bat Family] ally present. If this attack defeats the target, Nightwing immediately strikes again on another enemy with the lowest HP, dealing DMG. Nightwing is untargetable during the leap. Prioritizes the enemy champion with the lowest HP in auto mode.

skills.name: Double Ttouble
skills.description: Whenever Nightwing's basic attack deals Crit DMG, he deals additional Physical DMG to an enemy and gains 1 additional Energy.

skills.name: Son of Gotham
skills.description: Increases all Champions' ATK and [Assassin] Champions' Crit Rate.
